com.google.common.util.concurrent

类 Callables

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.util.concurrent.Callables

  • @GwtCompatible(emulated=true)
public final class Callables
extends Object
    Static utility methods pertaining to the Callable interface.
    从以下版本开始:
    1.0

      static <T> AsyncCallable<T> asAsyncCallable(Callable<T> callable, ListeningExecutorService listeningExecutorService)
      Creates an AsyncCallable from a Callable.
      static <T> Callable<T> returning(T value)
      Creates a Callable which immediately returns a preset value each time it is called.

      • returning

        public static <T> Callable<T> returning(T value)
        Creates a Callable which immediately returns a preset value each time it is called.

      • asAsyncCallable

        @Beta
 @GwtIncompatible
public static <T> AsyncCallable<T> asAsyncCallable(Callable<T> callable,
                                                                           ListeningExecutorService listeningExecutorService)
        Creates an AsyncCallable from a Callable.

        The AsyncCallable returns the ListenableFuture resulting from ListeningExecutorService.submit(Callable).

        从以下版本开始:
        20.0
